title: General
stimulusHtml:
2 points

1. Prediction [1 point]: The population will increase, decrease, or stabilize (level off).


2. Explanation [1 point]: Tie a correct explanation to the prediction. Increase — tie to abundant resources and freedom from competition. Decrease — tie to exhaustion of a key resource or density-dependent cause. Stabilize or level off — tie to carrying capacity or a limiting resource.
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.

1. Prediction [1 point]: The population will increase, decrease, or stabilize (level off).


2. Explanation [1 point]: Tie a correct explanation to the prediction. Increase — tie to abundant resources and freedom from competition. Decrease — tie to exhaustion of a key resource or density-dependent cause. Stabilize or level off — tie to carrying capacity or a limiting resource.

Student response earns one of the available points.

2. Explanation [1 point]: Tie a correct explanation to the prediction. Increase — tie to abundant resources and freedom from competition. Decrease — tie to exhaustion of a key resource or density-dependent cause. Stabilize or level off — tie to carrying capacity or a limiting resource.

Student response earns two of the available points.
